website_summaries.verdict: A huge storage capacity for a great price.
pros: Holds 223 cans, so it is perfect for large gatherings
An innovative drain design means you don't have to tip it to empty the water
cons: No clasp on the lid means it relies on snapping closed, which means it may open if it is tilted

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler for the price. Really holds the ice for many days when opened judiciously. Got this big cooler to store wild game on hunting trips so we're not in it all the time on trips. I bought a 70 qt version the Coleman Xtreme to store our food and beverages and couldn't be more pleased. Only complaint is that the lid is difficult to open because of the tight tolerance when closed. I'm guessing that's why it preforms so well. Seems solid and well constructed enough for how I use a cooler. It's not a Yeti or an RTIC, but it gets the job done at a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: The T's

customer_reviews.title: Very good cooler.
customer_reviews.text: Very good cooler...keeps ice all weekend long on camping trip with kids going in it 30+ times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Firemedic73

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Look, Great Delivery timing!!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived a week early and I was impressed that they likely thought I needed for the 4th of July. I did not but I was impressed that they made an effort to ship it so fast. I love companies that go the extra mile. The cooler is a great color that will not show dirt, grime and discolored white. The top is not a white rather an beige which is perfect! We are using this to house box lunches for our Pickleball Tournament in August! What a great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Puchala

customer_reviews.title: A Large and Durable Piece of Kit
customer_reviews.text: My son and I purchased two of these 150qt coolers in preparation of a hunt this winter and are already pleased with how they have performed this summer. The last Coleman cooler I purchased was back in 1989 and I'm still using it today.
customer_reviews.author: Tracker5usmc

customer_reviews.title: You won’t go wrong buying this cooler.
customer_reviews.text: Fits across back of my 2000 ford ranger perfect. Planing on using it to haul groceries , keeping food cooler on way home. lid a little hard to open, so I filed 2 knobs on lid till it closed to my liking. Green color matched my truck pretty good. Very well built and I am pleased with it. You won’t go wrong buying this cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara clark

customer_reviews.title: Holds ice very well, large storage
customer_reviews.text: This thing is massive, found one on side of road once that had a split, with insulation showing, it still held ice better than a more expensive one we had in camp
customer_reviews.author: Bobby jack

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy from Buy more and save.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get it from Buy more and save. What a disaster!
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Rest.....
customer_reviews.text: The Coleman "150 Qt. Cooler" truley is choice addage for anyone who needs a cooler of this size, and does note want to spend a ridiculous amounts of money 'nor tote extra lbs. when on an outing.......great product *Coleman* !
customer_reviews.author: J. Ott

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Huge cooler for the money. Held ice in 90+ degree weather for about 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: Green 150qt cooler coleman
customer_reviews.text: Wow amazing super fast delivery! Cooler looks great. 100% service
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler good price
customer_reviews.text: It's a big one ! My husband bought it for his fishing trips but discovered it was a little to big to strap on the back of the boats platform. Nice cooler good price.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Bolon

customer_reviews.title: what's with the drain plug?
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good cooler, I had a white Coleman 150qt and the drain on it was better ( screw on cap) instead of the push on plug that is on this model!!
customer_reviews.author: PILEDRIVER

customer_reviews.title: not pleased with the hassle of returning this item
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 150qt green extreme cooler and received a 120qt cooler blue extreme cooler , not pleased with the hassle of returning this item
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: It's gigantic
customer_reviews.text: This thing is massive!! Be wary that when this bad boy is full of ice and beverages, it will weigh ALOT!! Love it though, kept my food and drinks cold, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Stafford

customer_reviews.title: I use this cooler for hauling back meat from western ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this cooler for hauling back meat from western hunting trips each fall. I throw in a 5-10 lb block of dry ice with the meat before heading back east which is usually between 24-32 hrs driving. The meat is always frozen and at least half the block of dry ice left over by the time I get home. I couldn't ask for more. It's built rugged, and the lid closure is extremely tight on mine.
customer_reviews.author: Ytieflies
